main event: A UFO sighting was reported at Shaw AFB, South Carolina on 24th April 1954 at 01:02, by military personnel. The UFO was described as green and round with green exhaust, approximately the size of a pop bottle, and was observed for around 5 seconds while heading north at an estimated altitude of 7033 feet and speed of 5011 knots.
interesting points: The UFO was green and round with green exhaust, which is an unusual and specific detail.
It was observed through binoculars by personnel at the Columbia Radio Range Station.
The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 7033 feet and traveling at a speed of 5011 knots, which is unusually high and fast for the time.
The report indicates that there were no photographs but that physical evidence was not present.
The observation lasted only around 5 seconds, indicating a brief and sudden appearance of the UFO.
